CPTextLayer Class Reference

A Core Animation layer that displays a single line of text drawn in a uniform style. More...

Public Member Functions

Initialization
(id) - initWithText:
 Initializes a newly allocated CPTextLayer object with the provided text and the default text style.
(id) - initWithText:style:
 Initializes a newly allocated CPTextLayer object with the provided text and style. This is the designated initializer.
Layout
(void) - sizeToFit
 Resizes the layer to fit its contents leaving a narrow margin on all four sides.

Properties

NSString * text
 The text to display.
CPTextStyle * textStyle
 The text style used to draw the text.

Detailed Description

A Core Animation layer that displays a single line of text drawn in a uniform style.
